attributes.action: call for an immediate general election because the Country no longer has confidence in it, for the following reasons - they have brought the NHS to its knees, they have caused our Armed Forces to be the laughing stock of the world, they have destroyed our pensions system, they have emasculated our criminal justice system and allowed almost unlimited immigration, causing overcrowding, overdemand on an infrastructure already in crisis, disease and unemployment. Great Britain is in a state of collapse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: There are already several petitions on this theme which you may prefer to sign up to
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
